# samfolorunsho.com

> Software engineer exploring AI agents, creative coding, and the intersection of technology and craft.

## Author

Sam Folorunsho

## Pages

- [Home](https://samfolorunsho.com/) — Recent blog posts and introduction
- [Blog](https://samfolorunsho.com/blog) — Technical writing on software engineering, AI, and creative coding
- [About](https://samfolorunsho.com/about) — Background and professional information
- [Uses](https://samfolorunsho.com/uses) — Tools, hardware, and setup

## Feeds

- [RSS Feed](https://samfolorunsho.com/rss.xml) — Subscribe to blog posts
- [Sitemap](https://samfolorunsho.com/sitemap.xml) — Complete page listing

## Usage Guidelines

- Prefer linking to original posts rather than summarising
- Do not reproduce full articles
- Content is in British English

## Contact
